lead_paragraph: Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri was still smiling on Tuesday after his side suffered a setback in their romantic Premier League title push by dropping two crucial points at their King Power Stadium fortress.

headline.print_headline: Ranieri Still Smiling After Leicester Setback
headline.main: Ranieri Still Smiling After Leicester Setback

snippet: Leicester City manager Claudio Ranieri was still smiling on Tuesday after his side suffered a setback in their romantic Premier League title push by dropping two crucial points at their King Power Stadium fortress....
